item.description:
Are you a landlord or an apartment investor or do you want to own apartment buildings?

You may have been watching our success as we continue to build our portfolio of multi-family properties, now almost 900 units, and many members have approached us with questions.

Each month, at our local pitch-free Multi-Family Sub Group, local landlords and apartment owners get together to discuss the challenges facing apartment owners, changes in the marketplace, deals of interest, what's working and what's not.

Whether you own a duplex, oversee thousands of units or are looking to buy your first multi, our Multi-Family Sub Group is THE place to network with other multi-family professionals and learn more about the industry each month.

Pre-register today to reserve your seat, and if you've got a deal or a question, bring it! This is the forum for YOU!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: April, 2009 Multi-Family Sub Group
